LanguageData.UT_WrongRace.stages.0.label: different sleeve race
LanguageData.UT_WrongRace.stages.0.description: The race of my sleeve is not my own, this feels wrong.
LanguageData.UT_WrongGender.stages.0.label: different sleeve gender
LanguageData.UT_WrongGender.stages.0.description: The gender of my sleeve is not my own, this feels wrong.
LanguageData.UT_WrongGenderDouble.stages.0.label: different sleeve gender
LanguageData.UT_WrongGenderDouble.stages.0.descriptio: The gender of my sleeve is not my own, this is wrong.
LanguageData.UT_NewSleeve.stages.0.label: New sleeve
LanguageData.UT_NewSleeve.stages.0.description: I have a new body, this will take some getting used to.
LanguageData.UT_NewSleeveDouble.stages.0.label: New sleeve
LanguageData.UT_NewSleeveDouble.stages.0.description: I have a new body, this will take some getting used to.
LanguageData.UT_MansBody.stages.0.label: A man’s body
LanguageData.UT_MansBody.stages.0.description: I am in the body of a man, I don't like it!
LanguageData.UT_WomansBody.stages.0.label: A woman's body
LanguageData.UT_WomansBody.stages.0.description: I am in the body of a woman, I don't like it!
LanguageData.UT_JustCopy.stages.0.label: Just a copy
LanguageData.UT_JustCopy.stages.0.description: I am nothing more than a copy... What even am I?
LanguageData.UT_LostMySpouse.stages.0.label: Lost my spouse
LanguageData.UT_LostMySpouse.stages.0.description: My spouse stayed with my original copy, but I still love them. This isn't fair...
LanguageData.UT_LostMyFiance.stages.0.label: Lost my fiance
LanguageData.UT_LostMyFiance.stages.0.description: My fiance stayed with my original copy, but I still love them. This isn't fair...
LanguageData.UT_LostMyLover.stages.0.label: Lost my lover
LanguageData.UT_LostMyLover.stages.0.description: My lover stayed with my original copy, but I still love them. This isn't fair...
LanguageData.UT_SomethingIsWrong.stages.0.label: Something is wrong
LanguageData.UT_SomethingIsWrong.stages.0.description: Something feels wrong, as if I am not really myself. Am I imagining it?
